chinese: 新材料和技术正在改变建筑的风格。
english: New materials and techniques are changing the style of architecture.

chinese: 我们永远不应该低估创意设计的力量。
english: We should never underestimate the power of creative design.

chinese: 海洋环境已经被污染和不可持续的发展破坏。
english: Marine environment has been destroyed by pollution and unsustainable development.

chinese: 全球学术图书馆正在逐步融合社交媒体。
english: Academic libraries across the world are steadily incorporating social media.

chinese: 大学运营一套连续评估制度。
english: The college operates a system of continuous assessment.

chinese: 今年被认为是最重要的经济学家。
english: A world-renowned expert of financial management will give a guest lecture.

chinese: 依靠天赋才能在科学方面不会让你走得太远。
english: Relying on natural ability will not get you far in science.

chinese: 制造业的新发展不断改变着我们的生活方式。
english: New developments in manufacturing are constantly changing the way we live.

chinese: 依靠天赋才能在科学方面不会让你走得太远。
english: International exchanges formed the important part of our study program.

chinese: 制造业的新发展不断改变着我们的生活方式。
english: Request for late applications will not be accepted under any circumstances.
